title: Riot Tantram, I need to get in contact with you goodsir please.
body: Riot Tantram, I respect you as a Rioter immensely and wish to speak to you personally about a problem, I know this is weird but I have tried every other way to communicate with you and I have had good experiences with you in the past I think you are a great guy. I can only pray to Riot gods that you will answer my call.
